mapper.select: SELECT c.club_id, c.club_name, c.club_leader, c.club_people, c.club_intro, c.club_date, b.club_budget_price AS price, COALESCE(cs.successCnt, 0) AS successCnt, COALESCE(cm.join_Cnt, 0) AS join_Cnt FROM club c JOIN club_budget b ON c.club_id = b.club_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT club_id, COUNT(*) AS successCnt FROM club_success_history WHERE fn_get_code_name(success_state) = '성공' GROUP BY club_id ) cs ON c.club_id = cs.club_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT club_id, COUNT(member_id) AS join_Cnt FROM club_member WHERE stop_date IS NULL OR stop_date > CURRENT_DATE GROUP BY club_id ) cm ON c.club_id = cm.club_id WHERE c.club_id = #{clubId}
SELECT c.*, m.nickname as leader_name FROM club c join member m on c.club_leader = m.member_id ORDER BY club_id

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (
SELECT c.*, m.nickname as leader_name FROM club c join member m on c.club_leader = m.member_id WHERE club_name LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT c.*, m.nickname as leader_name FROM club c JOIN member m ON c.club_leader = m.member_id WHERE m.nickname LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' )
SELECT c.*, m.nickname as leader_name FROM club c join member m on c.club_leader = m.member_id
ORDER BY club_id DESC ) A
WHERE rownum <= #{page} * 6 ) b WHERE b.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 6

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM club WHERE club_name LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
FROM (SELECT c.*, m.nickname FROM club c JOIN member m ON c.club_leader = m.member_id WHERE m.nickname LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%')
FROM club

SELECT LPAD(ROWNUM, 2, '0') rnum, T.* FROM ( SELECT club_id , club_name , club_intro , fn_club_success_rate(club_id) AS success_rate , club_people , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM club_member WHERE CLUB_ID = C.CLUB_ID) AS join_cnt , fn_get_code_name(open_scope) AS open_scope , club_profile_img , fn_mem_nickname(club_leader) club_leader FROM CLUB C ORDER BY success_rate DESC, join_cnt DESC) T WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page}
SELECT c.* FROM club c JOIN club_member cm ON c.club_id = cm.club_id WHERE cm.member_id = #{memberId} AND cm.join_date is not null AND cm.stop_date is null
